Description: LTD ESP DV8-R Dave Mustaine Signature Korea electric guitar comes pre owned but in solid shape and after a few tweaks you'll be rocking harder than ever! This guitar would be best suited to harder and heavier styles of music and features Dave Mustaine's signature design specifications. This instrument has an array of features and specs which have been listed below: Mahogany Body and neck Rosewood fret board 24 Jump Frets Sperzel locking tuners Neck thru body construction Overall this LTD ESP DV8-R Dave Mustaine Signature Korea comes as shown for a stellar price!! Please message us with any questions you have prior to purchase! Feel free to make an offer via the "Best Offer" feature! AUS 21944923
Title: LTD ESP DV8-R Dave Mustaine Signature Korea
ConditionDescription: This LTD ESP DV8-R Dave Mustaine signature guitar comes pre owned with some wear, but is overall in decent shape and has seen testing to an extent. I have plugged this guitar in and played it, overall it plays and functions great, switches and knobs work well, machine heads and tuning are sturdy signal was pretty clear but it did sound like the 9V battery within was running low so you may wish to change it. Cosmetically the guitar has wear like surface scratches, scuffs, there is also a chip on one of the edges. The pickups also look as though they are slightly discoloured, also the strap lock on the top of the body is incomplete and not working, strap is included but the locks will need fixing/replacing. Overall this guitar is completely playable the way it is, it comes as a bare instrument as it is shown in the attached photos.
